name: SKRange
desc: A definition of a range of floating-point values.

items.name: init(value: CGFloat, variance: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new range object using a value and a maximum distance from that value.

items.name: class func withNoLimits() -> Self
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new range object that encompasses all possible values.

items.name: init(lowerLimit: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new range object that specifies only a minimum value.

items.name: init(upperLimit: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new range object that specifies only a maximum value.

items.name: init(constantValue: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new range object that specifies a constant value.
